Title: The Man
Writer: Jim Piddock (screenplay), Margaret Oberman (screenplay), Stephen Carpenter (screenplay), Jim Piddock (story), Margaret Oberman (story)
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Eugene Levy, Miguel Ferrer, Luke Goss
Plot: Special Agent Derrick Vann is a man out to get the man who killed his partner, but a case of mistaken identity leads him to Andy Fiddler, a salesman with too many questions and a knack of getting in Vann's way.
